arts.ttl: Barcelona enter free fall, whereas Atlético Madrid flex title credentials
arts.sum: Barcelona's inconsistency continues as Atlético Madrid's last-second 2-1 win over the Blaugrana see them move atop of LaLiga.

arts.ttl: Flick on late Barça defeat: We need the break
arts.sum: Hansi Flick said Barcelona need a break after Atlético Madrid inflicted a third straight home league defeat on them to replace them at the top of LaLiga on Saturday.

arts.ttl: ‘Very tough defeat’ - Pedri rues Barcelona’s missed chances
arts.sum: Barcelona midfielder Pedri admitted Saturday’s defeat to Atletico was tough to take after seeing the Catalans beaten 2-1 at home in La Liga . We had chances to close the game and when you don’t close it out, what happens happens.

arts.ttl: Simeone praises the subs after Atlético’s ‘very valuable’ win over Getafe
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media following the team’s dramatic late victory over FC Barcelona and praised his bench, saying that players out of the starting line-up “are ready to compete” and underlining that “the strongest thing we have is the group”. “The changes come in and really show it, we want to have everyone on the same level, and to compete with two monsters like Real Madrid and Barcelona we need everyone to be performing well.”

arts.ttl: Barcelona fans call for one player to be benched after Atlético defeat
arts.sum: Fans of La Liga giants Barcelona have on Saturday evening collectively called for one member of the club’s first-choice XI to be dropped. The player in question? Robert Lewandowski. Barcelona,…

arts.ttl: Barcelona 1-2 Atletico Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Diego Simeone's side go top with last-minute winner
arts.sum: Alexander Sorloth scores a last-gasp winner as Atletico Madrid defeat struggling Barcelona 2-1 in Catalonia to go top of the La Liga table.

arts.ttl: (WATCH) Rodrigo De Paul levels for Atletico Madrid at Barcelona
arts.sum: Barcelona have been pulled back to 1-1 in their crucial La Liga clash with Atletico Madrid. On a crucial night in Catalonia, both sides are fighting for the right to lead the table at the start of 2025 with Barcelona only ahead on goal difference before kick off. arts.ttl: Barcelona fans convinced their side were denied a clear penalty vs Atlético
arts.sum: Supporters of Barcelona have on Saturday evening made crystal clear their collective feelings that the club were denied what should have been a first-half penalty vs Atlético Madrid. Hansi Flick’s…

arts.ttl: Barcelona v Atlético Madrid: La Liga – live
arts.sum: La Liga updates from the 8pm GMT kick-off in Spain Live scores | Tables | Fixtures | Men’s top 100 in 2024 6 min Lopez’s cross is headed over in front of the near post by Lewandowski. It was actually Conor Gallagher who blocked that Raphinha shot, which might otherwise have beaten the diving Oblak. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona’s line-up to face Atlético, featuring two changes
arts.sum: The XI of players set to be depended upon by Barcelona for the club’s upcoming showdown with Atlético Madrid has been unveiled online. Barca, of course, are primed to return…
